dmca.title: Online-Loan-Calculator.com Complains of URL Hijacking in Google
dmca.body:
To: Google, Inc.
Attn.: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

From: Ecommerce Hosting Solutions, LLC
[private]
Midway UT 84049

Re: Digital Millennium Copyright Act, notice of alleged infringement

June 18th, 2004

As per the terms listed on: http://www.google.com/dmca.html I, [private], on behalf of Ecommerce Hosting Solutions, LLC, am formally submitting a notice of alleged infringement to Google, Inc under the terms of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

It seems an apparent glitch has confused Google into believing that our content, located at: 
      1.) http://www.online-loan-calculator.com 
... is really located on another page, located here: 
      2.) http://premiumquest.com/index.php?action=rated&link_id=454

For example, if you do a search on our first sentence: 
Search query: 'Whether you plan on buying a new auto, or you are considering a second mortgage loan on your home, we feel it is important to base important financial decisions on sound, mathematical calculations.'

Search Results: http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&ie=ISO-8859-
1 &q=Whether+you+plan+on+buying+a+new+auto2C+or+you+are+considering +a+s
econd+mortgage+loan+on+your+home2C+we+feel+it+is+important+to+base +important+financial+decisions+on+sound2C+mathematical+calculations. &btnG=Google+Search

We are asking that you please remove this dynamically created refresh  page from your database and replace it with our index page, so that  our intellectual property is not mistakenly, or unintentionally,  associated with another author and website.

3. Contact information:
[private]
xxx-xxx-xxxx/xxx-xxx-xxxx
[private]@dog-sled.com

4. Alleged copyright infringer's contact information:
Extreme Traffic Team 
attn: [private] 1-800-xxx-xxxx or the form located 
on their index page located here: 
http://www.ExtremeTrafficTeam.com/


5. Statement:

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law."

6. Statement:
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

7. Signature:


by [private], 
CEO Ecommerce Hosting Solutions, LLC
